name: Greedy Maze
description:
Casual next level maze game with 150 levels, in 5 different maze category, with 3 full customizable mode and 12 color themes for anyone who like solving mazes. Main idea was to add some new features like moving walls and 3D weave type of maze.

I imagined turning the classic very hard dark mode into something that can be crossed, so I decided to show the whole maze for a few seconds so that the player could remember the path.
